derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, or from German Rutil, from Latin rutilus 'reddish'

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral consisting of titanium dioxide in crystalline form; occurs in metamorphic and plutonic rocks and is a major source of titanium
